4.caption_en:
Two flat, overlapping banknote icons—one bearing a dollar sign and the other a euro sign—rendered in dark blue and gray on a white background.

{
  "artifact_type": "icon",
  "description": "Two overlapping stylized banknotes with currency symbols.",
  "objects": [
    {
      "type": "banknote",
      "currency": "USD",
      "symbol": "$",
      "color": "dark blue",
      "position": "top",
      "orientation": "rotated"
    },
    {
      "type": "banknote",
      "currency": "EUR",
      "symbol": "€",
      "color": "gray-blue",
      "position": "bottom",
      "orientation": "horizontal"
    }
  ],
  "count": 2,
  "style": "flat vector/icon",
  "background_color": "white",
  "overlap": true
}

5.caption_en:
A three-circle Venn diagram labeled PEOPLE, PLANET, and PROFIT with corresponding icons and a teal-highlighted central intersection, representing the overlap of social, environmental, and economic concerns (the triple bottom line).

{
  "type": "diagram",
  "subtype": "venn_diagram",
  "title": "People, Planet, Profit (Triple Bottom Line)",
  "elements": [
    {
      "id": "circle_people",
      "label": "PEOPLE",
      "position": "top",
      "icon": "group_of_people",
      "outline_color": "#294655",
      "outline_width_px": 8
    },
    {
      "id": "circle_planet",
      "label": "PLANET",
      "position": "bottom_left",
      "icon": "flower",
      "outline_color": "#294655",
      "outline_width_px": 8
    },
    {
      "id": "circle_profit",
      "label": "PROFIT",
      "position": "bottom_right",
      "icon": "currency_notes",
      "outline_color": "#294655",
      "outline_width_px": 8
    }
  ],
  "intersection": {
    "type": "ternary_intersection",
    "location": "center_bottom_between_circles",
    "highlight_color": "#58c7cc",
    "highlight_shape": "rounded_triangle-like",
    "notes": "Central area where all three circles overlap is filled/highlighted in teal."
  },
  "style": {
    "background_color": "#f6f7f7",
    "accent_color": "#58c7cc",
    "text_color": "#294655",
    "font_style": "sans_serif",
    "line_style": "solid"
  },
  "recognized_text": [
    "PEOPLE",
    "PLANET",
    "PROFIT"
  ],
  "description": "Graphic illustrating the triple bottom line: social (people), environmental (planet), and economic (profit) factors with icons for each and a highlighted shared intersection."
}
